titles.title: To extend the supplemental security income benefits program to Guam and the United States Virgin Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Income Security and Family Support.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. Amends part A (General Provisions) of title XI of the Social Security Act (SSA) to make Guam and the Virgin Islands eligible for the Supplemental Security Income program for the Aged, Blind, and Disabled under SSA title XVI.
